paragraphs.zh-tw: 今晚我們要演奏兩首歌曲我們是來自紐擇西的兄弟有趣的是信不信隨你，我們著迷於香草藍調今晚我們很興奮能為你們演奏（音樂）謝謝，謝謝
paragraphs.en: Tommy Mizzone: Tonight we're going to play you two songs. We're three brothers from New Jersey, and the funny thing is that, believe it or not, we are hooked on bluegrass and we're excited to play it for you tonight. (Music) TM: Thank you, thank you.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 謝謝你我是羅比米松。我13歲，我演奏小提琴
paragraphs.en: Robbie Mizzone: Thank you. I'm Robbie Mizzone. I'm 13, and I play the fiddle.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這是我弟弟，他今年10歲，他演奏五絃琴而吉他手是我14歲的哥哥，湯米
paragraphs.en: This is my brother, Jonny. He's 10, and he plays the banjo. And on guitar is my 14-year-old brother, Tommy.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 我們自稱為愛睏男生五絃琴男孩（音樂）謝謝
paragraphs.en: We call ourselves the Sleepy Man Banjo Boys. (Music) TM: Thank you.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 謝謝你們真的非常謝謝你們
paragraphs.en: JM: Thank you all. TM: Thank you very much.
